sqlMap.statement:
SELECT DISTINCT MIFS.RELN_MDSE_CD FROM MDSE_ITEM_FLIP_SET MIFS WHERE MIFS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MIFS.MDSE_CD IN
#mdseCd[]#
AND MIFS.MDSE_ITEM_RELN_TP_CD IN
#mdseItemRelnTpCd[]#
AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT DISTINCT MIFS.MDSE_CD FROM MDSE_ITEM_FLIP_SET MIFS WHERE MIFS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MIFS.RELN_MDSE_CD IN
#mdseCd[]#
AND MIFS.MDSE_ITEM_RELN_TP_CD IN
#mdseItemRelnTpCd[]#
AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
